titleStmt.title: Iambic or trochaic verse fragment associated with Archilochus

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - This is fine. Archilochus is CWKB 756; confirm supraline in l. 1; remove non-scribal accent in l. 2; insert vestig in ll. 3-5 instead of [.?] (before τοι, με, and after υ); insert a space before ἆρα in l. 6; insert scribal apostrophe after gamma in l. 9; encode <:τις|subst|τ〚ι〛ς:> in l. 12; rough breathing on εὗρε in l. 13; encode <:βη|subst|βην:> and add period in l. 14 before [ἐ]γὼ instead of ἐ̣γὼ; dot rho in moira l. 16; sigma of νηλεὴς in brackets in l. 16; extra space before scribal smooth breathing in l. 18; every line should begin and end [.?];

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - This is fine. Archilochus is CWKB 756; confirm supraline in l. 1; remove non-scribal accent in l. 2; insert vestig in ll. 3-5 instead of [.?] (before τοι, με, and after υ); insert a space before ἆρα in l. 6; insert scribal apostrophe after gamma in l. 9; encode <:τις|subst|τ〚ι〛ς:> in l. 12; rough breathing on εὗρε in l. 13; encode <:βη|subst|βην:> and add period in l. 14 before [ἐ]γὼ instead of ἐ̣γὼ; dot rho in moira l. 16; sigma of νηλεὴς in brackets in l. 16; extra space before scribal smooth breathing in l. 18; every line should begin and end [.?];
Submit - For initial entry of TM 59236 into DCLP. Part of research project with C. M. Sampson.
